name: 30 Seconds More
description:
Top Down Shooter

WASD + Arrow Keys or Twin Stick Gamepad

Game ends when you die or when 30 seconds passes. Press R or B at any time to reset your timer to 30, but watch out, resetting your timer also resets your score to 0!

More enemies spawn the longer you live, so keep resetting and surviving to get more spawns and more points.

Created by Alex Butt. Art by Mark Ferris and story by Brian Marr.
